jcr:content.jcr:title: List of United States natural gas companies

contentheadline.headline: List of United States natural gas companies

contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[natural gas]] companies in the [[United States]].''' {{Expand list|date=August 2008}} *[[Alabama]] – [[Alagasco]] *[[Alaska]] – Enstar Natural Gas *[[Arizona]] – [[Southwest Gas Corporation]], [[Transwestern Pipeline]] *[[Arkansas]] - CenterPoint Energy Gas Transmission, Kinder Morgan, Inc., Mississippi River Transmission, Spectra Energy, Inc. *[[California]] – City of Long Beach Gas & Oil Department, City of Palo Alto Gas Department, [[Pacific Gas and Electric Company|Pacific Gas & Electric]], [[San Diego Gas & Electric]], [[Southern California Gas Company|Southern California Gas]], Sierra Pacific - Nevada & California, Southwest Gas Corporation, Vernon Light & Power Department, Clean Energy *[[Colorado]] – [[El Paso Natural Gas]], [[Patara Oil & Gas]], [[Transwestern Pipeline]], [[Xcel Energy]] *[[Connecticut]] – [[City of Norwich Department of Public Utilities]], [[Northeast Utilities]] (via [[Yankee Gas]]), UIL Holdings Corp (via [[Connecticut Natural Gas]] and [[Southern Connecticut Gas]]) *[[Delaware]] – [[Northeast Utilities]] *[[District of Columbia]] – [[Washington Gas]] *[[Florida]] – [[Florida Gas Transmission Company]] *[[Georgia (U.S. state)|Georgia]] – [[AGL Resources]] *[[Hawaii]] - [[Hawai'i Gas]] *[[Kansas]] – [[Aquila, Inc.]], [[Atmos Energy]], [[Kansas Gas Service]], [[Panhandle Eastern Pipe Line]], [[Xcel Energy]] *[[Kentucky]] – [[EQT Corporation]] *[[Louisiana]] – [[Florida Gas Transmission Company]], [[Gulf South Pipe Line]], [[Trunkline Gas Company]] *[[Idaho]] – [[Avista Utilities]], [[Intermountain Gas Company]] *[[Illinois]] – Hudson Energy, Illinois Gas Transmission, [[Nicor Gas]], [[Panhandle Eastern Pipe Line]], [[Peoples Energy]] *[[Indiana]] – [[Panhandle Eastern Pipe Line]] *[[Iowa]] - [[MidAmerican Energy Company]] *[[Maine]] – [[Northeast Utilities]], [[Unitil]], [[Bangor Gas]], [[Maine Natural Gas]] *[[Maryland]] – [[Baltimore Gas & Electric]], [[Northeast Utilities]], [[Washington Gas]] *[[Massachusetts]] – [[Columbia Gas of Massachusetts]], [[NSTAR]], [[Northeast Utilities]] (including Western Massachusetts Electric Company/WMECO), [[Bay State Gas]] *[[Michigan]] – [[Consumers Energy]], [[DTE Energy]], ([[Michcon]]), [[We Energies]] *[[Mississippi]] - [[Atmos Energy]] *[[Missouri]] – [[Missouri Gas Energy]], [[City Utilities of Springfield]], [[Laclede Gas]] *[[Minnesota]] – [[Xcel Energy]], [[CenterPoint Energy]] *[[Nebraska]] - [[Metropolitan Utilities District]] *[[Nevada]] – [[NV Energy]], [[Southwest Gas Corporation]] *[[New Jersey]] – [[Elizabethtown Gas]], [[New Jersey Resources]], [[New Jersey Natural]], [[Northeast Utilities]], [[Public Service Enterprise Group]], [[South Jersey Industries]] *[[New Hampshire]] – [[Bay State Gas]], [[Northeast Utilities]] *[[New Mexico]] – [[Transwestern Pipeline]], [[Xcel Energy]] *[[New York]] – [[Central Hudson Gas & Electric]], [[National Fuel Gas]], [[National Grid plc|National Grid USA]], [[Northeast Utilities]], *[[North Carolina]] – [[Duke Energy]], [[Piedmont Natural Gas]], XOOM Energy *[[North Dakota]] – [[Xcel Energy]] *[[Ohio]] – [[East Ohio Gas]], [[Duke Energy]] *[[Oklahoma]] – [[Chesapeake Energy]], [[Devon Energy]], [[Oklahoma Gas & Electric]], [[Oklahoma Natural Gas]], [[ONEOK]], [[SandRidge Energy]], [[Xcel Energy]] *[[Oregon]] – [[Avista Utilities]], [[Northwest Natural Gas]] *[[Pennsylvania]] – [[EQT Corporation]], [[National Fuel Gas]], [[UGI Corporation|UGI]] *[[Rhode Island]] – [[National Grid plc|National Grid USA]] *[[South Carolina]] – [[Piedmont Natural Gas]], [[SCANA Corporation]] [[Lancaster County Natural Gas Authority]] *[[South Dakota]] – [[Xcel Energy]] *[[Tennessee]] – [[Piedmont Natural Gas]] *[[Texas]] – [[Atmos Energy]], CenterPoint Energy [[Florida Gas Transmission Company]], [[CoServ Gas]], [[Direct Energy]], [[Gulf South Pipe Line]], [[Patara Oil & Gas LLC]], [[Texas Natural Gas]], [[Transwestern Pipeline]], [[J-W Operating Company]], [[Xcel Energy]] *[[Utah]] – [[Questar Corporation (gas company)|Questar]] *[[Vermont]] – [[Northeast Utilities]] *[[Virginia]] – [[EQT Corporation]], [[Washington Gas]],[[Virginia Natural Gas]] *[[Washington (U.S. state)|Washington]] – [[Avista Utilities]], [[Puget Sound Energy]] *[[West Virginia]] – [[EQT Corporation]], [[NiSource]] *[[Wisconsin]] – [[We Energies]], [[Xcel Energy]] *[[Wyoming]] – [[Questar Corporation (gas company)|Questar]] ==See also== * [[Lists of public utilities]] [[Category:Lists of companies by industry|Natural gas companies, list of United States]] [[Category:Lists of companies of the United States|Natural gas]]
